subject: Basketball
Indecency, Obscenity and Profanity
Discrimination
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. has fined Kobe Bryant of the Los Angeles Lakers $100,000 for directing an antigay slur at a referee during Tuesday’s victory over the San Antonio Spurs.
snippet: The N.B.A. has fined Kobe Bryant of the Los Angeles Lakers $100,000 for directing an antigay slur at a referee during Tuesday’s victory over the San Antonio Spurs.
